bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Salient-Pole 50 Hz and 60 Hz Synchronous Generators and Generator/Motors for Hydraulic Turbine Applications Rated 5 MVA and Above
IEEE Standard for Salient-Pole 50 Hz and 60 Hz Synchronous Generators and Generator/Motors for Hydraulic Turbine Applications Rated 5 MVA and Above
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C50.12-2005 (Previously designated as ANSI C50.12-1982)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The requirements in this standard apply to all types of 50 Hz and 60 Hz salient-pole synchronous generators and generator/motors rated 5 MVA and above to be used for hydraulic turbine or hydraulic pump/turbine applications.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
